page.title: 11Southend:School life 1
page.content: School starts at{8.50}when the teacher on duty blows the whistle.The children line up in their classes and are led off by their teacher to their classrooms,where the{attendance}and {dinner registers}are taken. The children then work for an hour before going off to{assembly}in the hall.After assembly,at 10.30,the children are allowed into the playground for a break.After break,at about 11.00,the children return to the classrooms and work for an hour until {lunchtime}at 11.55.Lunch finishes at 1.15,when the children return once again to their classrooms and work until the{end of the day,at 3.15. Lessons include{swimming}in the school pool,built in 1962.
